is it possible to access some files from synaptic via on offline source?
not really sure what you mean by that
For example, downloading from a PC wit internet, then putting them onto a flash drive or CD, then using an a computer without a connection.
try the !offline factoid too.. it might be useful
you can also use the menu option "create download script" in syanptic
